
## d90 Inactive

```{r d90-inactive, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
d90i1 = read_d90i(file1, type1)
d90i2 = read_d90i(file2, type2)
d90i.diff = diff_d90i(d90i1, d90i2)
d90i.rmse.station = rmse_d90i(d90i.diff, "Station")
d90i.rmse.time = rmse_d90i(d90i.diff, "Time")

d90i.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_d90i) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("d90 Inactive Differences at Stations")
d90i.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_d90i) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("d90 Inactive RMSE at Stations")
d90i.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_d90i) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("d90 Inactive RMSE Through Time")
```
